Its a really fun game with a good plot and some replayability since you can get almost all of the achievements in less than 10 or 12 hours or so. Really good boss battle too, I don't know what it is but there's something about it I enjoyed a lot. Although the game is a bit short in terms of levels, its second installment makes up for it in many ways. Overall I will give this game 9.7/10 sklonps
Beautiful game. The original Portal. Try this before trying Portal 2!

Iyi bir oyun hele bide yaz indirimlerinde o kadar ucuz oluyorki anlstƒ±lƒ±cak gibi deil tadƒ±ndan yenmiyor ama multiplayer √∂zelliƒüi yok Multiplayer √∂zelliƒüi sadece "portal 2 " isimli oyunda var s√∂yleme gereƒüi duydum √ßunku brn bu oyunu multiplayer √∂zelliƒüinden dolayƒ± almƒ±≈ütƒ±m ama yokmu≈ü i≈üsiz gibi bu oyunu saatlerce oynayabilirsiniz √ßok sarƒ±yor buradan t√ºm valve √ßalƒ±≈üanlarƒ±nƒ± tebrik ediyorum

Just finish this game. Took me 3 hour I think to finish this game. Great game with unique gameplay and storyline. When I first use the   portal gun, I was mind blown with the portal gun capability and how you can use. This game make you use your brain. It a bit stress to play if you don't get to solve the problem but it satisfied when you get it and see the result.

I held off buying this game for so long, and I even removed / added it from my wish list several times. I'm so happy I finally purchased the bundle. Level design is incredible and the puzzles end up getting hard enough to remove chances of boredom. Hats off to Valve to design such a game that had high potential of extreme repetitiveness (creating / jumping through portals to get the the exit) BUT manage to deliver a game with not a feeling of repetitiveness at all - meaning, if this fell into the wrong hands, it would have been a total flop. Top notch level design.

My new rule of thumb: Overwhelmingly Positive = Do not hesitate or think twice, just BUY.
